short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple comments to likes ratio bar under x (formerly known as twitter) posts (formerly known as tweets)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FREE Chrome extension adding a slick comments to likes ratio bar under posts. And yep, you guessed it, we're talking about those tweets!

This little tech wizard works invisibly, won't slow you down, and the only thing you'll notice is a cool blue bar under those tweets getting ratioed. 

Hop aboard and grab this no-cost, no-hassle extension. Better yet, why not become part of the crew? Follow your boy at:

- https://twitter.com/misterjoessef
- https://www.youtube.com/@misterjoessef
- https://www.instagram.com/misterjoessef
- https://www.tiktok.com/@misterjoessef

Too many links, too little time? We feel ya. So we bundled them all here: https://linktr.ee/misterjoessef

And listen, we're giving you this nifty tool for free but if you've got some change burning a hole in your pocket and you like what we're doing, then we're here for it. Dollar signs not required but always appreciated: 

- https://www.patreon.com/misterjoessef
- https://cash.app/$misterjoessef

So what are you waiting for? Get your hands on this Chrome extension and start dominating your x experience like a boss!
